data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 12,861,900 people living in the state of Ontario.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ontario, Canada
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Ontario, Canada to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 12 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Ontario, Canada.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Ontario, Canada.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Parsee people. 0.2% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Lord, make the 1,001,565 believers in Ontario to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 11,860,335 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Over 28.82 percent of the people of Ontario are far from Jesus.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ontario, Canada has a population of 12,861,900.

We estimate Ontario has 1,001,565 people who might know Jesus, 8,153,647 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,706,688 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 12 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Ontario, Canada so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.
